attributes.action: Allow driving tests and lessons to continue during the second lockdown
attributes.additional_details: If the schools are open, where thousands and thousands of children who aren’t following social distancing rules can still attend their education, two people sat in a car both with masks on and with the windows down in a clean car should be allowed ! The backlog for the previous lockdown was diabolical. I am a daughter of a carer who cares for a family member of my own. Due to this lockdown, she will be the only worker. As my driving test has now been cancelled, I will not be able to help her out
attributes.background: I want the government to rethink their decision regarding suspending the tests until 5th December.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
